survey_brief: This survey aims to gather insights on employee preferences and usage patterns regarding sustainable office supplies within corporate environments.

questions.question_text: How often do you use sustainable office supplies (e.g., recycled paper, refillable pens) in your daily work?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure mobile-friendly dropdown implementation.

script.question_text: How often do you use sustainable office supplies (e.g., recycled paper, refillable pens) in your daily work?

questions.question_text: Which of the following sustainable office supplies do you currently use? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-select checkbox format. Randomize option order to minimize bias.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice checkboxes. Include 'Other (specify)' as an open-text option if needed.

script.question_text: Which of the following sustainable office supplies do you currently use? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What barriers prevent you from using more sustainable office supplies?
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 response is 'Sometimes', 'Rarely', or 'Never'.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture nuanced responses. Limit to 250 characters.

script.question_text: What barriers prevent you from using more sustainable office supplies?
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 response is 'Sometimes', 'Rarely', or 'Never'.

questions.question_text: How important is it for your company to prioritize sustainable office supplies?
questions.client_notes: 5-point Likert scale. Display vertically on mobile.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio buttons. No default selection.

script.question_text: How important is it for your company to prioritize sustainable office supplies?

questions.question_text: Would you be willing to participate in a company program to promote sustainable office supply usage?
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q4 response is 'Extremely', 'Very', or 'Moderately important'.
questions.client_notes: Include a skip logic explanation for survey transparency.

script.question_text: Would you be willing to participate in a company program to promote sustainable office supply usage?
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q4 response is 'Extremely', 'Very', or 'Moderately important'.
